queries.query: project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%)  AND issuetype in (Bug, 'Наведенный дефект приемки') ORDER BY priority
project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%)  AND issuetype in (Bug, 'Наведенный дефект приемки') AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) ORDER BY priority
project = 'HCSINT' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%)  AND issuetype in (Question) ORDER BY priority
project = 'HCSINT' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%)  AND issuetype in (Question) AND status not in (Закрыт, Отменена, Closed) ORDER BY priority

project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%)  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) AND issuetype in (Bug, 'Наведенный дефект приемки') AND priority = Blocker ORDER BY priority

project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%)  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) AND issuetype in (Bug, 'Наведенный дефект приемки') AND priority = Critical ORDER BY priority

project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%)  AND status not in ('На тестировании', Закрыт, Отменена) AND issuetype in (Bug, 'Наведенный дефект приемки') AND priority = Major ORDER BY priority

project = 'ГИС ЖКХ' AND issue in linkedIssues(%issues%)  AND issuetype in (Bug, 'Наведенный дефект приемки') AND priority = Major ORDER BY priority
